alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 22 at 6:24PM MDT until March 22 at 11:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Periods of Snow. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches, with around 6 inches in the southern parts of the Bighorn Mountains. * WHERE...Bighorn Mountains Southeast, and Southeast Johnson County. * WHEN...Now until 11 PM this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions during periods of heavier snowfall. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow is expected until around 9 PM.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Southeast Johnson County
